name: HD800S
description: Known for its expansive soundstage and unparalleled clarity, the HD800S is ideal for critical listening, offering precise imaging and exceptional detail.

name: LCD-X
description: These planar magnetic headphones offer accurate bass response and an open, natural sound with impressive detail, ideal for mixing and mastering.

name: Utopia
description: Utopia delivers incredible dynamics, lifelike detail, and transparency with a wide frequency range, making them perfect for audiophiles seeking perfection.

name: DT 1990 Pro
description: These highly detailed headphones offer outstanding sound quality with exceptional clarity, especially for critical listening and mixing.

name: Susvara
description: Known for its exceptional detail, transparency, and soundstage, the Susvara offers an almost ethereal listening experience.

name: MDR-Z1R
description: High-end closed-back headphones with a wide frequency range, rich bass, and crystal-clear highs, perfect for immersive listening in any environment.

name: LCD-4
description: The LCD-4 offers incredible bass depth, midrange clarity, and high-frequency extension, all with stunning accuracy and depth.

name: HD660S
description: A refined successor to the HD650, delivering smooth and natural sound with enhanced bass response and greater overall clarity.

name: K812
description: AKG’s flagship open-back model, offering a highly accurate sound signature with crystal-clear highs and a wide soundstage.

name: SRH1540
description: With their well-balanced sound, the SRH1540 is great for both casual listening and critical monitoring, featuring a comfortable, durable design.

name: Clear
description: Delivering exceptional clarity and detail, the Clear headphones provide an engaging listening experience with a slightly warmer sound signature.

name: T1 (3rd Gen)
description: These high-impedance headphones offer outstanding transparency, balance, and a broad soundstage, ideal for audiophiles and professionals alike.

name: Arya
description: Featuring a wide soundstage, the Arya delivers an extremely detailed, open sound with excellent bass control and midrange clarity.

name: 99 Classics
description: Combining style with excellent sound, the 99 Classics provide deep bass, warm mids, and clear highs, making them a favorite for both casual and audiophile listening.

name: P9 Signature
description: The P9 Signature delivers an immersive sound with rich bass, clear mids, and crisp highs, perfect for audiophiles seeking balanced and detailed sound.

name: TH900 MK2
description: These headphones offer deep, powerful bass and rich mids, paired with exceptional sound isolation, making them a top choice for bass lovers.

name: Cascade
description: Offering a balanced and punchy sound signature, the Cascade headphones are perfect for those who enjoy a dynamic listening experience with excellent isolation.

name: ATH-R70x
description: These open-back headphones offer a natural, clear, and expansive sound, making them a great option for professionals and audiophiles alike.

name: SR-009
description: The SR-009 provides unparalleled transparency, clarity, and speed, offering one of the most detailed and lifelike listening experiences available.

name: Atrium
description: These handcrafted headphones deliver a natural, balanced sound with smooth mids and a deep, immersive bass response, perfect for long listening sessions.
